name: Strange Powers Up!
description:
A fighter game where you must survive waves of enemies using Strange PowerUps (TM) you find along the way!

Submission for the Game Dev Field Guide July 2022 Jam for the theme: Strange Powerups

//Notes:

//When I was thinking about 'strange powerups' I came up with powerups centered around a character, Mr. Strange. I already had kind of an image in my head of the kind of game I wanted to make. I could probably have done more to make the powerups  'stranger' but still really happy with how my first jam went!

//The modifier was an art style you haven't used before, which did help with the process of creating this art even though I normally do pixel art. I tried to use looser lines and a different color style.
